meanings.definition: Students in the first or second year of high school or college.
meanings.sent1: The lowerclassmen were excited to start their first year of high school.
meanings.sent2: The lowerclassmen gathered in the cafeteria for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The lowerclassmen decided to have a picnic in the classroom.
meanings.sent4: The lowerclassmen were like fresh buds in the garden of education.
meanings.sent5: The lowerclassmen eagerly awaited their first day of classes.

meanings.definition: A group of underclassmen in a school or university.
meanings.sent1: The lowerclassmen formed a study group to prepare for exams.
meanings.sent2: The lowerclassmen participated in the school talent show.
meanings.sent3: The lowerclassmen organized a surprise party for their teacher.
meanings.sent4: The lowerclassmen were the backbone of the school's spirit.
meanings.sent5: The lowerclassmen cheered loudly at the football game.
